article_title: Magic Johnson: I Don't Hate Trump ... We Can Be Friends After Hillary Wins
article_text:
Magic Johnson I Don't Hate Trump We Can Be Friends After Hillary Wins

EXCLUSIVE

There is a LOT going on in this video ...

First, Magic Johnson was having a power lunch with ex-Disney CEO Michael Eisner Thursday -- and teased that they might be working on a project together.

Next, despite the fact he's a HUGE Hillary Clinton supporter, Magic says he's still open to doing business with Donald Trump -- and wants to be friends with the guy -- as long as Hillary is president.

Third, Magic opens the door to working with Kobe Bryant ... telling TMZ Sports he believes Mamba will be a great businessman and would welcome the chance to team up on a project.

Fourth, check out Magic's suit ... dude is always dressed like a BOSS!

... all in an 81 second clip.

Great video.
